channel.title: Ben's Vault
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: Drambo
item.description: Drambo is a modular groovebox that combines an intuitive modular system with a fast and tactile sequencer. It allows you to create synthesizers, audio effects, and midi effects while also allowing for composition and emphasizing performance.

item.title: groovebox
item.description: A groovebox is an electronic music instrument that emphasizes live performance.

item.title: subtractive synthesis
item.description: Subtractive snythesis generally uses complex waveforms that are rich in harmonics and [filters] to control the harmonics. It also usually uses a voltage controlled amplifier to control the shape of the sound.

item.title: synthesizers
item.description:
A synthesizer is a musical instrument that generates audio signals and sound through various different methods. The signal is synthesized because it is generated by the instrument, not as a prerecorded sample.
Some common types of synthesis are subtractive synthesis, Frequency Modulation, Additive, Phyiscal Modelling, Granular, and Wavetable.
